section.title: Technology Requirements
section.p: Part of this course involves teaching you how to use certain calculus tools on a graphing calculator such as a TI-84, TI-89 or Casio Classpad. You are required to have one and bring it to class everyday.
You will also need Internet access for most of your homework. If you do not have Internet access at home, you can find it in PCC computer labs.
Here are some Sage cells where you can do certain things that you cannot do so easily with a graphing calculator.
